```{r}
ggplot(
  data = dat_aug_03,
  mapping = aes(x = Alcohol_consumption,
                fill = Mortality,
                na.rm = TRUE)
) +
  geom_bar(alpha = 0.6,
           position = "stack") +
  scale_fill_viridis_d() +
  labs(
  title = "Patient outcomes",
  subtitle = "stratified by alcohol consumption",
  x = "Alcohol consumption"
)
```
